lead_paragraph: HERRICK--Rhoda. Lincoln Center Theater is deeply saddened by the death of Rhoda Herrick. She loved the theater, and was a generous and loyal supporter of our Theater and of so many others. She was unique and single-minded, and if she loved you, she loved you for life! We will miss her and we send condolences to her family. Andre Bishop, Producing Artistic Director J. Tomilson Hill, Chairman Eric M. Mindich, President 1/3
